name: Superior Rune of Thorns
description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Superior Sigil of Benevolence
description:
Element: Enhancement
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
Gain a charge that grants a 0.5% increase in healing to other allies each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

name: Superior Sigil of the Stars
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
Gain a charge of +2 to all stats each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

name: Superior Rune of the Mesmer
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +33% Daze duration; increase strike damage dealt to dazed foes by 10%.

name: Superior Sigil of Demons
description:
Element: Enhancement
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Increase the duration of inflicted torment by 20%.

name: Superior Sigil of the Night
description:
Element: Pain
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Outgoing damage is increased by 3% with an additional 7% at night.

name: Superior Sigil of Battle
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Gain 5 stacks of might for 12 seconds when swapping to this weapon in combat. (Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

name: Superior Rune of the Golemancer
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +125 Ferocity; summon a golem while in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Rune of Evasion
description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +125 ferocity; gain swiftness for 6 seconds after evading an attack. <c=@reminder> Cooldown: 1 second.</c>

name: Superior Sigil of Luck
description:
Element: Enhancement
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: 75% chance to gain a random boon on killing an enemy.

name: Zephyrite Paraglider Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Superior Rune of the Cavalier
description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: Using an <c=@abilitytype>Engage</c> ability grants quickness and bonus damage for 5 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20s)</c>

name: Superior Rune of the Berserker
description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Superior Sigil of Paralyzation
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: +30% Stun Duration

name: Superior Rune of Orr
description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Superior Sigil of Renewal
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
Heal Nearby Allies on Weapon Swap (360 Radius)
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

name: Superior Rune of Speed
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +20% Swiftness Duration; increase movement speed by 66% when under the effect of swiftness.

name: Superior Sigil of Agility
description:
Element: Enhancement
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Gain 5 seconds of swiftness and 1 second of quickness when swapping to this weapon in combat. (Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

name: Superior Rune of the Defender
description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Maximum Health; heal for 5% of your maximum health after blocking an attack. (Cooldown: 1 Second)

name: Superior Sigil of Impact
description:
Element: Pain
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
+7% Strike Damage vs. Stunned or Knocked-Down Foes
+3% Strike Damage

name: Superior Sigil of Hydromancy
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
Damage nearby foes and chill them for 2 seconds when you swap to this weapon while in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

name: Superior Sigil of Vision
description:
Element: Enhancement
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Critically strike an enemy for 3 seconds after swapping to this weapon in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Rune of the Flock
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Increased Maximum Health; you and nearby allies are healed for an additional amount after you use a healing skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Sigil of Speed
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Gain Swiftness (20 Seconds) on Killing a Foe

name: Superior Rune of the Nightmare
description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Condition Duration; deliver an attack that transfers a condition and blinds nearby enemies after using an elite skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 45 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Rune of Resistance
description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: -10% Incoming Condition Duration; gain resistance for 4 seconds after activating an elite skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Sigil of Torment
description:
Element: Pain
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
Inflict 2 stacks of torment for 5 seconds to enemies around your target upon landing a critical hit.
(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)

name: Superior Sigil of Karka Slaying
description:
Element: Pain
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
+7% Strike Damage vs. Karka
+3% Strike Damage

name: Superior Sigil of Restoration
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Gain health when interrupting a foe. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Sigil of Bursting
description:
Element: Enhancement
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: +5% Condition Damage

name: Superior Rune of Exuberance
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: 3% of vitality is converted to healing power.
5% of vitality is converted to precision.
7% of vitality is converted to power.

buff.description:

bonuses: +20% Might duration; increase strike damage by 5% while under the effect of might.

bonuses: +125 Toughness; gain 5 stacks of might for 10 seconds after using a healing skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)</c>

buff.description:

name: Superior Sigil of Ruthlessness

buff.description: Gain 5 stacks of might for 10 seconds when interrupting a foe. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 3 Seconds)</c>

bonuses: Gain +500 healing power for 3 seconds after casting a glyph.

name: Superior Sigil of Demon Slaying
description:

buff.description:
+7% Strike Damage vs. Demons
+3% Strike Damage

Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: Apply 5 stacks of might for 8 seconds when you place a trap.
